titleStmt.title: The royal recreation; or, A second part, containing the passages between the farmer and his wife at their return home, where they found the King with his noble retinue. Tune of Let Caesar live long. Licensed according to order.

publicationStmt.publisher: Printed for P. Brooksby, J. Deacon, J. Blare, J. Back.,

notesStmt.note: Place and date of publication suggested by Wing.
Verse: "The most Royal frollick of William our King ..."
Reproduction of original in the British Library.
